To amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to promote a high-quality workforce in the child welfare system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This bill permits the Children's Bureau of the Administration for Children & Families to provide grants for programs that support a high-quality workforce to prevent, identify, and treat child abuse and neglect.
